code:
%% Sequence Diagram: Play Command Flow %% Purpose: Shows the complete flow when a user executes /play command %% Author: Discord Bot Team %% Last Updated: 2025-11-03 sequenceDiagram autonumber actor User as üë§ Discord User participant Discord as Discord API participant Gateway as Gateway Service participant Redis as Redis Pub/Sub participant Audio as Audio Service participant DB as PostgreSQL participant Lavalink as Lavalink participant YouTube as YouTube API Note over User,YouTube: User wants to play a song in voice channel %% Command Initiation User->>Discord: /play query: "never gonna give you up" activate Discord Discord->>Gateway: INTERACTION_CREATE event activate Gateway Note over Gateway: Validate interaction
Check permissions Gateway->>Discord: POST /interactions/{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController}/callback
(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) Discord->>User: Show processing message deactivate Discord %% Command Processing Gateway->>DB: SELECT * FROM guild_settings
WHERE guildId = ? activate DB DB-->>Gateway: Guild settings (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) deactivate DB Gateway->>Redis: PUBLISH discord-bot:commands
{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker} activate Redis Note over Redis: Message queued in pub/sub Redis->>Audio: Message delivered deactivate Redis activate Audio %% Audio Service Processing Note over Audio: Extract query and guild info Audio->>DB: SELECT * FROM queue
WHERE guildId = ? activate DB DB-->>Audio: Current queue (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) deactivate DB %% Search for Track alt Query is YouTube URL Note over Audio: Parse YouTube URL
Extract video ID else Query is search term Audio->>Lavalink: GET /loadtracks?identifier=ytsearch:{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController} activate Lavalink Lavalink->>YouTube: Search API request activate YouTube YouTube-->>Lavalink: Search results deactivate YouTube Lavalink-->>Audio: Track results (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) deactivate Lavalink Note over Audio: Select first result end %% Cache Search Results Audio->>Redis: SETEX search:{IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode} 300 {IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream} activate Redis Redis-->>Audio: OK deactivate Redis %% Add to Queue alt Queue is empty Note over Audio: This will be the first track Audio->>DB: INSERT INTO queue
(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) activate DB DB-->>Audio: Queue entry created (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) deactivate DB %% Start Playback Audio->>Lavalink: POST /sessions/{IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode}/players/{IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream}
{IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic} } activate Lavalink Note over Lavalink: Create player
Connect to voice channel Lavalink->>Discord: Voice connection (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) activate Discord Discord-->>Lavalink: Voice connection established deactivate Discord Lavalink->>YouTube: Stream audio data activate YouTube Note over Lavalink: Download and encode audio YouTube-->>Lavalink: Audio stream deactivate YouTube Lavalink->>Discord: Send opus packets (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) activate Discord Discord->>User: üéµ Audio playback in voice channel deactivate Discord Lavalink-->>Audio: Player updated event deactivate Lavalink else Queue has tracks Note over Audio: Add to end of queue Audio->>DB: SELECT MAX(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) FROM queue
WHERE guildId = ? activate DB DB-->>Audio: maxPosition deactivate DB Audio->>DB: INSERT INTO queue
(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) activate DB DB-->>Audio: Queue entry created deactivate DB end %% Update Cache Audio->>Redis: SET queue:{IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode} {IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode}
EX 3600 activate Redis Redis-->>Audio: OK deactivate Redis %% Send UI Update alt First track (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) Audio->>Redis: PUBLISH discord-bot:ui:now
{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}, ... } activate Redis Redis->>Gateway: UI update message deactivate Redis Gateway->>Discord: POST /channels/{IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream}/messages
{IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode], components: [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] } activate Discord Discord->>User: üéµ Now Playing: Song Title
[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] deactivate Discord Gateway->>Discord: DELETE /webhooks/{IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic}/messages/@original
(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) activate Discord deactivate Discord else Added to queue Gateway->>Discord: POST /webhooks/{IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic}/messages/@original
{IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)", ephemeral: true } activate Discord Discord->>User: ‚úÖ Added to queue (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) deactivate Discord end deactivate Gateway deactivate Audio Note over User,YouTube: User hears music playing in voice channel %% Track Events loop Every 5 seconds Lavalink->>Audio: PlayerUpdate event
{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker} activate Audio Audio->>Redis: PUBLISH discord-bot:to-discord
{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker} activate Redis Redis->>Gateway: Player update event deactivate Redis Note over Gateway: Update UI if needed
(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) deactivate Audio end %% Track End Note over Lavalink,Audio: Track finishes playing Lavalink->>Audio: TrackEnd event
{IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic} activate Audio Audio->>DB: DELETE FROM queue
WHERE guildId = ? AND position = 0 activate DB DB-->>Audio: Deleted deactivate DB Audio->>DB: UPDATE queue SET position = position - 1
WHERE guildId = ? activate DB DB-->>Audio: Queue reindexed deactivate DB alt More tracks in queue Audio->>DB: SELECT * FROM queue
WHERE guildId = ? AND position = 0 activate DB DB-->>Audio: Next track deactivate DB Note over Audio: Play next track
(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) else Queue empty and autoplay enabled Note over Audio: Generate autoplay recommendation Audio->>Audio: Get similar tracks
based on last played Note over Audio: Add to queue and play else Queue empty and autoplay disabled Audio->>Lavalink: DELETE /sessions/{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}/players/{IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode} activate Lavalink Lavalink-->>Audio: Player destroyed deactivate Lavalink Audio->>Redis: PUBLISH discord-bot:ui:now
{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker} activate Redis Redis->>Gateway: Queue empty event deactivate Redis Gateway->>Discord: PATCH /channels/{IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic}/messages/{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController}
{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] } activate Discord Discord->>User: Queue finished (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) deactivate Discord end deactivate Audio Note over User,YouTube: Flow complete
